data Branch' t h p c = Branch {
  • terms :: Map t (Map (Referent'' t h) (MetadataSetFormat' t h))
  • types :: Map t (Map (Reference' t h) (MetadataSetFormat' t h))
  • patches :: Map t p
  • children :: Map t c
}
name: Branch' Branch patches terms types children

display_html: data MetadataSetFormat' t h = Inline (Set (Reference' t h))
name: MetadataSetFormat' Inline

name: quadmap

data DefinitionOp' r

data Diff' t h p c = Diff {
  • terms :: Map t (Map (Referent'' t h) (DefinitionOp' (Metadata t h)))
  • types :: Map t (Map (Reference' t h) (DefinitionOp' (Metadata t h)))
  • patches :: Map t (PatchOp' p)
  • children :: Map t (ChildOp' c)
}
name: Diff' Diff patches terms types children

display_html: type Metadata t h = Reference' t h
name: Metadata

data Patch' t h o = Patch {
  • termEdits :: Map (Referent'' t h) (Set (TermEdit' t o))
  • typeEdits :: Map (Reference' t h) (Set (TypeEdit' t o))
}
name: Patch' Patch typeEdits termEdits

display_html:
data PatchDiff' t h d = PatchDiff {
  • addedTermEdits :: Map (Referent'' t h) (Set (TermEdit' t d))
  • addedTypeEdits :: Map (Reference' t h) (Set (TypeEdit' t d))
  • removedTermEdits :: Map (Referent'' t h) (Set (TermEdit' t d))
  • removedTypeEdits :: Map (Reference' t h) (Set (TypeEdit' t d))
}
name: PatchDiff' PatchDiff removedTypeEdits removedTermEdits addedTypeEdits addedTermEdits

data Integrity

  • | UnknownHash Hash
  • | NoObjectForHashId HashId

  • | NoNamespaceRoot
  • | MultipleNamespaceRoots [CausalHashId]
  • | NoSchemaVersion
  • | MultipleSchemaVersions [SchemaVersion]
  • | NoTypeIndexForTerm Id
name: Integrity UnknownHashId UnknownTextId UnknownObjectId UnknownCausalHashId UnknownHash NoObjectForHashId NoObjectForPrimaryHashId NoNamespaceRoot MultipleNamespaceRoots NoSchemaVersion MultipleSchemaVersions NoTypeIndexForTerm
